# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to maintaining the security of `ProxyPulse-High-Performance-SOCKS-Validator-CLI`. We actively monitor and address security vulnerabilities. Currently, only the latest version of the software is actively supported and receives security updates.

| Version       | Supported          |
|---------------|--------------------|
| Latest        | :white_check_mark: |
| Previous      | :x:                |
| Older         | :x:                |
